scripts.publish: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=latest --no-private --no-push --yes -m "chore(gaman) publish packages"
scripts.publish:next: npm run build && npx tsc-alias && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=next --no-private --no-push --yes -m "chore(gaman) publish packages"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build && npx tsc-alias && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --dist-tag=beta --no-private -m "chore(gaman) publish packages"
scripts.publish:test: npm run build && npx tsc-alias && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --dist-tag=test --no-private --no-push -m "chore(gaman) publish packages"
scripts.yalc:push: npm run build && cd ./packages/core && yalc push && cd ../common && yalc push && cd ../cli && yalc push
